name: Delve (itch) (DREAMSEED)
description:
Arrive at the island (snow-covered, blaspheme white)
Delve into the crypt (desolate, dark as pitch)

Use the ARROW KEYS or WASD to move.
Use SPACE or ENTER to interact with things.

Thank you for playing ♥

    

WEIRD BROWSER ERROR?

The game cannot run in the Mozilla Firefox browser. This is very unfortunate, but is the result of SharedArrayBuffer security choices and certain HTML5 export compatabilities. Please try another browser.

FINAL NOTES

This is my entry for BIRTHDAY GAME 2023! It's an indulgently overscoped prototype dungeon delver smashing together a lot of things I love from both old and modern games. Because of the self-imposed time limit I had no time to implement things like combat, puzzles, or other fun stuff beyond basic mechanics and rudimentary tilesets. That's okay: DELVE has soft potential and I had a great time working on her.
If you want to give me a birthday present, you can choose to donate when hitting the download button, but for as long as DELVE remains a busted little prototype, she will remain free of charge! Thank you for taking your time, and leave a comment ♥
